name: Technology PR
overview:
If you’re like many of our clients, you’re already convinced of the value of an effective technology PR and corporate communications program to build awareness and credibility. You may have even worked with other technology PR firms before - yet now you’re looking for measurable results, no account team turnover, will accept only senior-level PR representation, and have a cap on your technology PR budget. If you’re nodding you’re head, read on…

Over the past 20 years, Technology PR principal Alison Minaglia has personally represented more than 50 business-to-business and business-to-consumer technology focused clients and maintains current relationships and knowledge of national media and industry analyst interests which are leveraged on behalf of all clients. A seasoned consultant on B2B and B2C technology PR accounts to large PR agencies, start-up technology companies, midsize corporations, and Fortune 500 technology company divisions, Alison personally handles all media and analyst outreach thereby increasing results and enhancing client visibility while reducing overall technology PR expenditures.
